genericGuidanceItem1: [W]you can upload letters, photos or documents if they are relevant to what you want to tell or ask the tribunal. Please do not upload any other material at this stage. If the tribunal needs to see documents before making a decision then you may be asked to provide them at a later stage
genericGuidanceItem2: [W]if you are taking a picture of a letter, place it on a flat surface and take the picture from above
genericGuidanceItem3: [W]if you are uploading written documents with tracked changes, make sure that tracked changes are turned on
formHearing: [W]Give details of your application in the text box or upload a file

contactApplicationText.label: [W]Use this box for any accompanying information (Optional)

contactApplicationText.required: Defnyddiwch y blwch testun neu’r cyfleuster llwytho ffeil i roi manylion
contactApplicationText.tooLong: Rhaid i’ch manylion fod yn llai na 2500 o nodau
